root.name: Sonic the Hedgehog 4: Episode 1
root.description: Sonic the Hedgehog 4 is an episodic platform video game and a sequel in the Sonic the Hedgehog series. The game was developed by Dimps alongside members of Sonic Team and is intended to be inspired by and similar to the original Sonic the Hedgehog titles on the Sega Mega Drive/Genesis.
